title: Pretreatment with aqueous Moringa oleifera Lam. leaf extract prevents cadmium-induced hepatotoxicity by improving cellular antioxidant machinery and reducing cadmium accumulation
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Visarut Buranasudja, Kittipong Sanookpan, Sornkanok Vimolmangkang, Asma Binalee, Kamil Mika, Sucheewin Krobthong, Kittikhun Kerdsomboon, Supeecha Kumkate, Toemthip Poolpak, Siraprapa Kidhakarn, Kwang Mo Yang, Tossapol Limcharoensuk, Choowong Auesukaree
